ConfigurationOption.Value: select l.location, l.description, l.type, l.status, lh.systemid, l.isdefault, lh.children, (select count(*) from asset where location = l.location and siteid = l.siteid) assetcount, lh.parent, l.siteid, l.orgid, l.locationsid, lh.lochierarchyid from locations l left join lochierarchy lh on l.location = lh.location and l.siteid = lh.siteid and l.orgid = lh.orgid

List.ListEntry: l.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' )
